verbs.description: it [ARGM-TMP: the only day of the year] to [V: go] [ARG4: inside the portland fire museum] the 16th open house for the portland fire museum is on saturday october 13th it is staffed until 3 00 pm and is free to the public portland fire department portland fire museum portland south portland maine
